bodytext.p:
7 days / week : 5:30 pm to 12:30 am, from Home to Library and Library to Home.
Free for all Central students, faculty and staff.
Call our shuttle service @ 210-880 - 2241.

Houston Airports Drops / Pickups:
Current Students : $ 65
San Antonio Greyhound Bus staion and San Antonio Airport:
Current Students : $10

*** Reservation are required for all airport Drops/Pickups, atleast 3 days in advance. All checks are made payable to Central University. All checks must be hand delivered to Ms. Vickie Davis, Maes 0-107, during regular business hours, Mon - Fri : 8:00am to 5:00pm.
For further questions, please call us: 210-880-2241 (or) email us nan.nelson@central.edu.
